price: Lẹ́yìn náà, A mójú kúrò fún yín lẹ́yìn ìyẹn nítorí kí ẹ lè dúpẹ́ (fún Allāhu).
arabic: ثُمَّ عَفَوۡنَا عَنكُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ ذَٰلِكَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: thumma ʿafawnā ʿankum min baʿdi dhālika laʿallakum tashkurūna
